quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: It's when the 'international community' expresses 'concern' about your 'situation' that your situation is well and truly fucked.
author: Michael D. Weiss

quote: Ideas are worth nothing unless backed by application. The smallest of implementations is always worth more than the grandest of intentions.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results.
author: Anonymous

quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
author: Andre Gide

quote: It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it.
author: Maurice Switzer

quote: Any fool can know. The point is to understand.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Think before you speak. Read before you think.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

quote: The price good men pay for indifference to public affairs is to be ruled by evil men.
author: Plato

quote: You only live twice: Once when you are born. And once when you look death in the face.
author: Ian Fleming

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Perfect don’t mean that it’s working.
author: Joji

quote: If you ever ask me how many times you’ve crossed my mind, I would say once. Because you came, and never left.
author: Ritu Ghatourey

quote: No confundas la independencia con la soledad.
author: Animal Crossing
